original_text: He did evil in the eyes of the Lord, as his father Manasseh had done. Amon worshiped and offered sacrifices to all the idols Manasseh had made.
korean_text: 그의 아버지 므낫세의 행함 같이 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 아몬이 그의 아버지 므낫세가 만든 아로새긴 모든 우상에게 제사하여 섬겼으며

sentences.original_text: He did evil in the eyes of the Lord
as his father Manasseh had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 므낫세가 행했던 것 같이
